data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Macau. Through your servants plant 10 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Macau, Macao
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Macau, Macao.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Macau, Macao.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Macau, Macao.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Macau
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Macau, Macau, Macao.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Macau. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Please, convict the 3,866 believers in Macau, Macao to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.section_summary:
the state of Macau, Macao has a population of 53,700.

We estimate Macau has 3,866 people who might know Jesus, 0 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 49,834 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Macau to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.
